name: Escape from Moto-Moto
description: In this exciting fangame, King Julian and Maurice are partying when Moto Moto suddenly appears and shoots King Julian. As Julian fights to stay alive, Moto Moto kidnaps Maurice and disappears. It's up to Julian to survive as long as possible while searching for a way to rescue Maurice and bring Moto Moto to justice. Can you help Julian succeed in this dangerous mission? Play to find out!
